title: Gate.io marketing fee
body:
We should use 100k USD from the Pangolin multi-sig marketing & operations budget to pay the Gate.io minimum marketing spend fee. Listing on a large centralized exchange (CEX) like Gate.io will be great for the liquidity of the PNG token, as well as bring new users and holders of the PNG token into the ecosystem.

This marketing spend is in line with what other projects (ex: Verso Finance) have paid to get listed on Gate.io. More details available on https://gov.pangolin.exchange/
author: 0x3B7631F8E3428dEaB77634BF799b622ce412e9Ea
